DOC.brief_title: Systems Addressing Frail Elders ( SAFE ) Care Implementation
DOC.detailed_description: Three Magnet hospital Los Angeles County ( Huntington Hospital , Torrance Memorial Medical Center Ronald Reagan UCLA Health System ) collaborate demonstration evaluation project ( Multiple Case-Study Design ) . The project engage interprofessional hospital leadership ; provide train coach implementation process SAFE Care model ; track outcome SAFE Care model implement three collaborate site hospital ( three case study ) . The investigator hope contribute exist state science dissemination implementation evidenced-based innovation . The collective data three site ( collect interview hospital leadership staff de-identified patient data program implementation outcomes ) provide information effectiveness implementation process support dissemination .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Organizational Leadership Nursing Unit Leadership/staff Adults age 65 year Exclusion criterion : 65 year old hospice protocol dying/comfort care protocol .
